# Bardic College (Building)
## Overview
**Bardic College**

**Create** 107 Goods, 13 Influence, 109 Labor, 1 Magic (4,810 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Auditorium (Room)|Auditorium]], 2 [[Bath (Room)|Baths]], 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 1 [[Book Repository (Room)|Book Repository]], 1 [[Bunks (Room)|Bunks]], 2 [[Classroom (Room)|Classrooms]], 1 [[19a - Common Room|Common Room]], 1 [[Courtyard (Room)|Courtyard]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 2 [[Office (Room)|Offices]], 1 [[Scriptorium (Room)|Scriptorium]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]], 1 [[Statue (Room)|Statue]], 1 [[Storage (Room)|Storage]]

A center for artistic learning in the visual and performing arts, literature, music, and lore.
